agents.util

Class EncodingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.util.EncodingUtil

  • public class EncodingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    String encoding utility class to help with the conversion to/from a byte array within the Messages.
    See Also:
    Message.data

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EncodingUtil()

      De-serialises an object from a byte array to an Object.
      static java.lang.String BytesToString(byte[] in)

      Serialises an object to a byte array and returns it.

    • Method Detail

      • StringToBytes

        public static byte[] StringToBytes(java.lang.String in)
        Converts the String given by the in parameter and converts to a byte array using the StandardCharsets.UTF_8 char-set.
        Parameters:
        in - The string to convert to a byte array.
        Returns:
        The UTF-8 formatted byte array representation of the string in.
        See Also:
        StandardCharsets.UTF_8

      • BytesToString

        public static java.lang.String BytesToString(byte[] in)
        Converts the byte array given by the in parameter and converts to a String using the StandardCharsets.UTF_8 char-set. This is a functional opposite of StringToBytes(java.lang.String)
        Parameters:
        in - The byte array to convert to a string.
        Returns:
        The String representation of the UTF-8 byte array in.
        See Also:
        StandardCharsets.UTF_8

      • ObjToBytes

        public static byte[] ObjToBytes(java.lang.Object in)
        Serialises an object to a byte array and returns it. If the object does not implement Serializable or if serialisation fails then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        in - The object to serialise to bytes.
        Returns:
        The serialised byte array of the object.

      • BytesToObj

        public static java.lang.Object BytesToObj(byte[] in)
        De-serialises an object from a byte array to an Object. This method will return null if de-serialisation fails.
        Parameters:
        in - The byte array to de-serialise.
        Returns:
        The resulting object; or null if the objects class cannot be found or if reading fails.
